titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: Dominican Republic
Dominican Republic

div.head: Legislation
div.p: There is no official legislation governing access to diplomatic archives.

div.head: Location
div.p: National Archives: C/Modesto Diaz No. 2, Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic, 2870.
Ministry of Foreign Affairs: Av. Indepencia No. 752, Estancia San Gerónimo, Santo Domingo.

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact both the National Archives and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to inquire about access to diplomatic records.
